topic.title: Perfect p2p social network
topic.body: What should be the p2p forum, social network, chat (system, program / plug-in complex) to be popular and in demand?

1562446077_1HVtb9ohKcH19u1Cp3WrwTJipYdm1.body:
> [filips](#comment_67_1LFu1BTScmY82HHtg3TY2jAuSrCYNsQWEY): This are some things that I think are important: [...]

Could you say what ZeroNet don`t have and it need to be in other p2p system?
